titles.title: Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/22/2009--Introduced. Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare program.
